Crisis Phone: KELOWNA CRISIS LINE:  1.888.353.2273 (1.888.353.CARE)DISTRESS LINE: 1.800.784.2433 (1.800.SUICIDE) SENIORS' DISTRESS LINE: 1.604.872.1234 MENTAL HEALTH SUPPORT: 310.6789 ONLINE SERVICES: www.youthinbc.comwww.crisiscentrechat.ca
Service Details: - Represents provincial member crisis lines associations from across BC and is dedicated to ensuring that every person in BC has access to the needed emotional support and critical services that crisis lines provide - Developed two provincial networks: 1800SUICIDE and 310Mental Health Support to enhance immediate access to 24-hour crisis line services for anyone at anytime from anywhere in BC
